summary:
This is my first mod, it is quite small and i havent experienced any problems with it yet.

I am just one of many Cicero adoring fans, sadly our little Jesters appearance isn't everyone's cup of tea... I redefined the Keeper- adding a little bit of a darker look, longer + darker hair, brighter eyes which are now green
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is my first mod, it is quite small and i havent experienced any problems with it yet. Please note that I am still getting the hang of creating mods.

I am just one of many Cicero adoring fans, sadly our little Jesters appearance isn't everyones cup of tea... I redefined the Keeper- adding a little bit of a darker look, longer + darker hair, brighter eyes which are now green, slight stubble and a smaller nose. 
Fine face textures for men by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4184206]urshi[/url] is active during the screenshots for this mod. I also love to use this mod along with the Cicero Marriage Mod by[/size] [size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4820251]zheria[/url]. [/size]
[size=4][b][u][i]
This is the same as my ReadMe so I wont upload that file just read here:[/i][/u][/b][/size]
[size=4][u]Conflicts:
[/u][/size][size=3]This mod will probably conflict with other mods that edit Ciceros facial features, skin tone and hair.
This mod does not conflict with fine face textures for men (by [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4184206]urshi[/url] ) 
[size=3]This mod DOES WORK with saves that have already encountered Cicero.[/size]

[size=4][b]DO NOT STEAL OR USE THIS MOD ANYWHERE WITHOUT MY GIVEN PERMISSION AS THIS MODS AUTHOR.
[/b][/size][b][u]
[size=4]Installation:
[/size][/u][/b][size=4]Should be simple- This is a zip folder.[/size] [size=3]Read any new versions to see if they are of interest to you and choose your version to install.[/size]

[b][u][size=4]TIPS (from experience): [/size]
[/u][/b][size=3]Do a clean save (load game, delete save that was just loaded and save again) after installing most mods as this can solve and prevent most common problems.[/size]
author: Cher5
